stories.text:
After latest apple content scanning privacy debarcle, I will likely migrate away from apple. They have destroyed my trust such that I canâ€™t tolerate the uncertainty they may change their minds later or introduce a hash inspection function secretly.

Which leaves the question: where to go? What is the best alternative to apple products?My current working suggestions, but would greatly appreciate others weighing in.

Phone: Pixel with graphene OS Laptop: System 76 laptop or X1 carbon Watch: Garmin variety of some description Cloud storage: probably nextcloud self hosted
stories.title: Ask HN: Best privacy preserving alternatives to Apple products?
